definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: At Waterloo, he was chief of a squadron of cuirassiers, in Dubois' brigade.
sentences.chinese: 滑鐵盧戰爭中，他在杜布瓦旅當鐵甲騎兵隊隊長。

sentences.english: On his cuirass he wore the silver cross of the Legion of Honor.
sentences.chinese: 在他的鐵甲上，有個銀質的功勳十字章。

sentences.english: How big were the cataphract horses?
Starscream's ghost awakens and heads to Tryptic.
sentences.chinese: 紅蜘蛛之鬼魂甦醒，隻身前往鐵甲星。

sentences.english: Nothing could break through the armor of the new tank.
sentences.chinese: 沒有任何東西可穿透這輛新戰車的鐵甲。

sentences.english: Qing government was stimulated by Japanese invasion into Taiwna, Ding Ri-chang etc.
sentences.chinese: 丁日昌等極力主張購買鐵甲艦，抵抗日本的侵略。

sentences.english: Armadillos aren't the only creatures who rely on gravity to get the ball rolling.
sentences.chinese: 犰狳是唯一依靠重力形成球形鐵甲團滾動的動物。

sentences.english: " Armored steel fist" just finished robot boxing inspirational mission.
sentences.chinese: 《鐵甲鋼拳》就這樣完成了機器人打拳擊勵志的使命。

sentences.english: Chou is exactly like an ironclad in this:he has the grace of iron.
sentences.chinese: 不錯，周先生正好就像一艘鐵甲戰艦，他有鐵的優雅。

sentences.english: Perhaps Reel Steal would be the better title.
sentences.chinese: 或許取名爲《鐵甲神偷》更合適。

sentences.english: Oslash; Starscream's ghost awakens and heads to Tryptic.
sentences.chinese: 紅蜘蛛之鬼魂甦醒，隻身前往鐵甲星。

sentences.english: He gave orders to Milhaud's cuirassiers to carry the table-land of Mont -Saint-Jean.
sentences.chinese: 他命令米約的鐵甲騎兵去佔領聖約翰山高地。

definition: like a hot knife through butter (idiom)/with irresistible force
Kaesong or Gaeseong city in southwest North Korea, close to the border with South Korea and a special economic zone for South Korean companies
fight a battle of words/cross verbal swords
magnificent army with thousands of men and horses (idiom); impressive display of manpower/all the King's horses and all the King's men
(bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
to charge and break through enemy lines
